name: CopySlayer
description:
The game is currently under development, but you can play the game like the demo version.

There are 4 characters to choose from, each with a different basic attack. When you level up by catching monsters and collecting crystals, you can choose one of three skills.

Gameplay allows you to move your character using the keyboard arrow keys or wasd.

Not yet added in current version.
